# isAuthorizedForRecording()

**Type Method**

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the app is authorized to record sensor data.

## Declaration

```swift
class func isAuthorizedForRecording() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the app is authorized to record sensor data or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if it is not.

## Checking the Availability of Sensor Recording

- **isAccelerometerRecordingAvailable()**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether accelerometer recording is supported on the current device.
- **authorizationStatus()**: Returns a value indicating whether the app is authorized to record sensor data.
- **CMAuthorizationStatus**: The authorization status for motion-related features.
